item0.name: Shard of True Ice
item0.description:
40 Ability Power
75 Health
100% Base Mana Regen
3 Gold Per 10 Seconds

Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.

This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

item1.name: Moonstone Renewer
item1.description:
40 Ability Power
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Starlit Grace: When affecting champions with Attacks or Abilities in combat, restore 50 - 100 (based on ally level) Health to the most wounded nearby ally (2s cooldown). Each second spent in combat with champions increases this healing effect by 12.5% (to a maximum of 50%).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item2.name: Mobility Boots
item2.description:
25 Move Speed
  • When out of combat for at least 5 seconds, increase this item's effect to 115.

item3.name: Dark Seal
item3.description:
15 Ability Power
40 Health
  • Glory: Gain 2 stacks for a champion kill or 1 stacks for an assist (up to 10 stacks total). Lose 4 stacks on death.
  • Dread: Grants 5 Ability Power per stack of Glory.

    Obtained Glory stacks are preserved between this item and Mejai's Soulstealer.

item5.name: Forbidden Idol
item5.description:
10% Heal and Shield Power
50% Base Mana Regen

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Arcane Comet
perk0.shortDesc: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.
perk0.longDesc:
Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.

Adaptive Damage: 30 - 100 based on level (+0.2 AP and +0.35 bonus AD)
Cooldown: 20 - 8s

Cooldown Reduction:
Single Target: 20%.
Area of Effect: 10%.
Damage over Time: 5%.

item0.name: Shard of True Ice
item0.description:
40 Ability Power
75 Health
100% Base Mana Regen
3 Gold Per 10 Seconds

Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 0 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.

This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

item1.name: Chemtech Putrifier
item1.description:
50 Ability Power
20 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Puffcap Toxin: Dealing magic damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds. Healing or shielding an ally will cause their next damage to enemy champions to apply 60% Grievous Wounds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item2.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item2.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item3.name: Moonstone Renewer
item3.description:
40 Ability Power
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Starlit Grace: When affecting champions with Attacks or Abilities in combat, restore 50 - 100 (based on ally level) Health to the most wounded nearby ally (2s cooldown). Each second spent in combat with champions increases this healing effect by 12.5% (to a maximum of 50%).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item5.name: Control Ward
item5.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Summon Aery
perk0.shortDesc: Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.
perk0.longDesc:
Damaging enemy champions with basic attacks or abilities sends Aery to them, dealing 10 - 40 based on level (+0.1 AP) (+0.15 bonus AD).

Empower or protecting allies with abilities sends Aery to them, shielding them for 35 - 80 based on level (+0.25 AP) (+0.4 bonus AD).

Aery cannot be sent out again until she returns to you.

item0.name: Imperial Mandate
item0.description:
40 Ability Power
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Coordinated Fire: Abilities that Slow or Immobilize a champion deal 36 - 60 (based on level) bonus magic damage and marks them for 4 seconds. (6s cooldown per champion) Ally champion damage detonates the mark, dealing an additional 90 - 150 (based on ally level) magic damage and granting you both 20% Move Speed for 2 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 15 Ability Power.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item3.name: Watchful Wardstone
item3.description:
25 Ability Haste
  • Arcane Cache: This item can store up to 3 purchased Control Wards.
  • Visions of Ixtal: Increase your Stealth Ward and Control Ward placement caps by 1.

    Ixtali Wardstone upgrades from Stirring Sightstone and cannot be purchased

item4.name: Ardent Censer
item4.description:
60 Ability Power
10% Heal and Shield Power
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Sanctify: Healing or Shielding an ally enhances you both for 6 seconds, granting your Attacks 10% - 30% (based on ally level) Attack Speed and 5 - 20 (based on ally level) magic damage On-Hit.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

200 Health

100% Base Mana Regen

item1.name: Redemption
item1.description:
20% Heal and Shield Power
200 Health
15 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen

Active - Intervention: Target an area within 5500 range. After 2.5 seconds, call down a beam of light to Restore 180 - 360 (scales with ally level) Health to allies and burn enemy champions for 10% max Health true damage (120s cooldown).

Item can be activated whilst dead. Damage and healing reduced by 50% if the target has recently been affected by another Intervention. Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item3.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item3.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item4.name: Imperial Mandate
item4.description:
40 Ability Power
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
100% Base Mana Regen
  • Coordinated Fire: Abilities that Slow or Immobilize a champion deal 36 - 60 (based on level) bonus magic damage and marks them for 4 seconds. (6s cooldown per champion) Ally champion damage detonates the mark, dealing an additional 90 - 150 (based on ally level) magic damage and granting you both 20% Move Speed for 2 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 15 Ability Power.

    Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Summon Aery
perk0.shortDesc: Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.
perk0.longDesc:
Damaging enemy champions with basic attacks or abilities sends Aery to them, dealing 10 - 40 based on level (+0.1 AP) (+0.15 bonus AD).

Empower or protecting allies with abilities sends Aery to them, shielding them for 35 - 80 based on level (+0.25 AP) (+0.4 bonus AD).

Aery cannot be sent out again until she returns to you.
